title: Contact Information
instruction: Please provide your contact details below. Fields marked with an asterisk (*) are required.
html:
<label>First Name*<input type='text' name='firstName' required aria-required='true'></label>
<label>Last Name*<input type='text' name='lastName' required aria-required='true'></label>
<label>Email*<input type='email' name='email' required aria-required='true'></label>
<label>Phone Number<input type='tel' name='phone'></label>

title: Time Lost
instruction: If you lost time due to this issue and want to submit a claim, check the box below and complete the required details.
html: > I want to claim reimbursement for time lost

title: Review and Submit
instruction: Please review your entries before submitting the form.
html: Make sure all required fields are completed and you have uploaded any necessary documentation before submitting.
